title: Count Digits
algorithmDescription: Count the number of digits in a given integer
detailedDescription: Write a program that reads an integer and outputs the count of digits in that number. For example, 12345 has 5 digits, and 99 has 2 digits.
hints: Convert number to string and measure length (simple approach)
Alternatively, use modulo operator in a loop to count digits
Or use logarithm: log10(n) + 1 gives digit count
Handle edge cases like 0 or single-digit numbers
commonMistakes: Using regex complexity when simpler methods exist
solutionApproach: Simplest: convert to string, return length. Alternative: loop and divide by 10 repeatedly.
testCaseCriteria: Must correctly count digits for any non-negative integer input
